data.text:
Worst 5 star hotel on Earth, period. We went on a honeymoon, and whenever you pay as much as we did, you‚Äôd expect everything to be perfect (it costs as much as the Emirates Palace in Abu Dhabi, which we also went to, and its a dream hotel). 
Well‚Ä¶it was far away from that. Actually, it was far away from acceptable. 
Nobody on the reservation warned us that they would change times and other things because of the Ramadan (all the other hotels we checked do). 
The room just feels outdated. 
They try to push a car that costs 3 times as much as a regular taxi every time you leave the hotel. 
But nothing beats the horrible attention from the staff. We have experienced a terrible disappointment at the pool. 
With staff telling us to leave one part of the pool because they were assembling tables for the Ramadan Iftar. But worse than that, was a family doing an absurd noise (including using speakers on the pool!!! Absurd!!!) and they weren‚Äôt doing nothing!!! I had to go to the General Manager upstairs to complain so they‚Äôd do anything. What succeeded I won‚Äôt even bother telling (already had a discussion with Yousef, the Manager, and Ahmad, the security staff). 
If I could give zero stars, I would. 
The only thing that‚Äôs good there is the view. 
Att.,
Daniel
data.title: Worst 5 Star Hotel ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Daniel,

Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We have reached out to you directly to address your concerns and offer our sincere apologies for any inconvenience you experienced during your honeymoon.

At Palace Downtown Hotel, the safety and security of our guests are of paramount importance to us. We deeply regret any lapses in service or communication that may have detracted from your experience. Rest assured, we have taken your feedback to heart and are committed to addressing the issues you raised to ensure that future guests enjoy a seamless and enjoyable stay.

We understand the significance of your special occasion and apologize for any disruptions caused by changes related to Ramadan. Please know that we continuously strive to provide exceptional service and experiences for all our guests, and we appreciate your patience and understanding.

We have also taken note of your feedback regarding transportation options and will review our procedures to ensure transparency and guest satisfaction.

Once again, we apologize for falling short of your expectations and thank you for bringing these matters to our attention. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with the exceptional stay you deserve.

Regards
Stefan Masche
Management Office
owner_response.author: Stefan Masche

data.text: I Had a great experience in the hotel. Mr. Waseem has been a great help for the stay. He catered to my requirements and made my stay comfortable. And also Mr. Dimuth for his excellent service at the table in the restaurant. Very humble and nice. Overall, My stay was very comfortable.
data.title: Great Stay & Experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Palace Downtown Hotel! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great stay and that Mr. Waseem and Mr. Dimuth contributed to making it memorable.

Providing exceptional service to our guests is our top priority, and we're delighted that our team members went above and beyond to ensure your comfort and satisfaction. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to both Waseem and Dimuth.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another comfortable stay in the future. Until then, safe travels!

Regards
Stefan Masche
Management Office
owner_response.author: Stefan Masche

data.text: Amazing Atmosphere, the experience was wonderful. We went for Iftar and the food was cooked to perfection, everything was fresh and delicious.The buffet had great varieties.From savory to sweet. The service was outstanding, especial Mark was really friendly and helpful
data.title: Ramadan Iftar

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience of our Iftar at Palace Downtown Dubai. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed every aspect of your visit, from the delicious food to the outstanding service provided by our team.

It is delightful to know that you found our Iftar offerings cooked to perfection, with fresh and delicious options spanning from savory to sweet. Our culinary team takes great care in curating a diverse and delightful buffet experience, and we are pleased that you found it to your liking.

We are especially grateful for your kind words regarding the outstanding service provided by Mark. Delivering friendly and helpful service is a priority for us, and we are delighted to hear that Mark's dedication to guest satisfaction shone through during your visit.

Thank you once again for choosing Palace Downtown Dubai for your Iftar experience. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable dining experience.

Regards,
Stefan Masche
Management Office
owner_response.author: Stefan Masche

data.text: Mark has been the best part of this iftar! Selection as always very diverse. Loved the roasted lamb. Atmosphere is very warm and welcoming. All the staff are pleasant.  Will definitely come back again. Well done to the whole team. Am so full :)
data.title: Dinner in a Palace

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you immensely for your delightful feedback regarding your recent Iftar experience at Palace Downtown Hotel! We are thrilled to hear that Mark and our entire team made your evening exceptional.

It brings us immense joy to know that you found our Iftar selection diverse and enjoyed the succulent roasted lamb. Creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere is at the core of our hospitality ethos, and we are thrilled that you felt the genuine hospitality extended by our staff.

Your kind words motivate us to continue striving for excellence in every aspect of our service. We are incredibly grateful for your patronage and are eagerly looking forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience.

Once again, thank you for choosing Palace Downtown Hotel for your Iftar celebration, and we can't wait to have the pleasure of serving you again soon!

Regards
Stefan Masche
Management Office
owner_response.author: Stefan Masche
